Who are we?

We are Nexus Bytes: Affordable boutique servers, priceless bespoke experience, powered by NexusCare!

Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.
We are not here to sell you services, we are here to earn your business
Give your project a fast and reliable service, that it deserves!

Get your blazing fast Ryzen (3700x/3900x/3950x) and NVME powered Bad ASS VPS from a brand, that cares about you!

To top it off, we are also offering some solid Switchers Special and Contract Buyout offer to switchers, where you can get up to 4 months of free services

We take pride in real 24/7 round the clock support with an average of 1 hour resolution time. Would you like to see if our existing family members are properly taken cared of? YTD Ticket response feedback, provided by real family members:
